title: Ep 2: The Peculiar Case of the VTech Hacker
description: VTech makes toy tablets, laptops, and watches for kids. In 2015, they were breached. The hacker downloaded gigs of children's data. Discover what the hacker did once he took the data.
itunes:title: The Peculiar Case of the VTech Hacker
itunes:author: Jack Rhysider
itunes:subtitle: VTech makes toy tablets, laptops, and watches for kids. In 2015, they were breached. The hacker downloaded gigs of children's data. Discover what the hacker did once he took the data.
